zh-CN.DEMO_USAGE_3: 选中内容右键可以复制到剪切板
zh-CN.DEMO_USAGE_4: 输入时右键可以粘贴剪切板内容
zh-CN.DEMO_USAGE_5: 双击窗口可以强制获取焦点
zh-CN.DEMO_USAGE_6: 拖拽窗口四个角可以缩放大小
zh-CN.DEMO_USAGE_7: 引入不同的主题css可以应用不同主题
zh-CN.TERM_GUIDE_ASK: 为了帮助你对插件功能有个大概的了解，你是否需要引导？(y/n)：
zh-CN.TERM_GUIDE_RETRY: 请按照引导输入命令 {guideCommand} 或输入 {exitCommand} 退出引导
zh-CN.TERM_GUIDE_COMMAND_LIST: 首先带你认识一下支持的消息格式，默认的消息是普通文本格式，请输入{guideCommand}
zh-CN.TERM_GUIDE_COMMAND_JSON: 接下来是json格式数据，请输入{guideCommand}
zh-CN.TERM_GUIDE_COMMAND_CODE: 接下来是code格式数据，拓展可支持 highlight 和 codemirror 高亮显示，请输入{guideCommand}
zh-CN.TERM_GUIDE_COMMAND_TABLE: 接下来是表格数据，请输入{guideCommand}
zh-CN.TERM_GUIDE_COMMAND_LOOP: Terminal支持批量插入多条消息，请输入{guideCommand}
zh-CN.TERM_GUIDE_COMMAND_HTML: 接下来是自定义html消息，你可以在此基础上构建任意你需要的消息样式，请输入{guideCommand}
zh-CN.TERM_GUIDE_COMMAND_ANSI: 本插件支持ANSI着色控制码的解析，请输入{guideCommand}
zh-CN.TERM_GUIDE_COMMAND_FLASH: 如果你想展示执行过程动画可以使用插件实时回显功能，你可以把它当做Flash使用，请输入{guideCommand}
zh-CN.TERM_GUIDE_COMMAND_EDIT: 如果你想编辑文本文件，插件也提供了简单的文本编辑器，请输入{guideCommand}
zh-CN.TERM_GUIDE_COMMAND_ASK: 如果你想获取到用户输入可以使用插件Ask功能，请输入{guideCommand}
zh-CN.TERM_GUIDE_FINISH:
🎉 恭喜你完成了所有的引导，上面已为你展示本Demo支持的所以命令，另外插件还支持拖拽、全屏等功能也可在Demo中体验。
🤗 更多关于插件的内容请前往 https://github.com/tzfun/vue-web-terminal 查看，如果你觉得做的不错给个⭐️支持一下吧~
zh-CN.TERM_GUIDE_ANSI_PRODUCE: vue-web-terminal 支持 ANSI 码的着色解码功能，但暂不支持其他的光标、设备、窗口控制等，默认会将不支持的 ANSI 码过滤。

en-US.DEMO_BTN_4:
Multi Window Example
(tick me multiple times)
en-US.DEMO_USAGE_1: Drag the window header to drag
en-US.DEMO_USAGE_2: Double-click the window header to full screen
en-US.DEMO_USAGE_3: Right click on the selected content to copy it to the clipboard
en-US.DEMO_USAGE_4: When typing, right click to paste the clipboard contents
en-US.DEMO_USAGE_5: Double-clicking the window can force focus
en-US.DEMO_USAGE_6: Drag the four corners of the window to resize
en-US.DEMO_USAGE_7: Introducing different theme css can apply different themes
en-US.TERM_GUIDE_ASK: To help you get a general understanding of the plugin's functionality, do you need a guide? (y/n):
en-US.TERM_GUIDE_RETRY: Please follow the guide and enter command {guideCommand} or enter {exitCommand} to exit the guide
en-US.TERM_GUIDE_COMMAND_LIST: First, let me introduce you to the supported message formats. Please enter {guideCommand}
en-US.TERM_GUIDE_COMMAND_JSON: Next is the json format data, please enter {guideCommand}
en-US.TERM_GUIDE_COMMAND_CODE: Next is the code format data, which can be connected to highlight and codemirror. Please enter {guideCommand}
en-US.TERM_GUIDE_COMMAND_TABLE: Next is the table data, please enter {guideCommand}
en-US.TERM_GUIDE_COMMAND_LOOP: Terminal supports batch insert of multiple messages. Please enter {guideCommand}
en-US.TERM_GUIDE_COMMAND_HTML: Next is the custom html message. You can build any message style you need based on this. Please enter {guideCommand}
en-US.TERM_GUIDE_COMMAND_ANSI: This plugin supports parsing of ANSI coloring control codes, please enter {guideCommand}
en-US.TERM_GUIDE_COMMAND_FLASH: If you want to show the execution process animation, you can use the realtime echo function of the plugin. You can use it as flash. Please enter {guideCommand}
en-US.TERM_GUIDE_COMMAND_EDIT: If you want to edit text files, the plugin also provides a simple text editor. Please enter {guideCommand}
en-US.TERM_GUIDE_COMMAND_ASK: If you want to get user input, you can use the Ask plugin function, please enter {guideCommand}
en-US.TERM_GUIDE_FINISH:
🎉 Congratulations on completing all the instructions. All the commands supported by this demo have been shown above. In addition, the plugin also supports drag and drop, fullscreen and other functions, which can also be experienced in the Demo.
🤗 For more information about the plugin, please visit https://github.com/tzfun/vue-web-terminal . If you think it's good, give a ⭐️ to support it~
en-US.TERM_GUIDE_ANSI_PRODUCE: vue-web-terminal supports ANSI code coloring decoding function, but does not support other cursors, devices, window controls, etc., and will filter out unsupported ANSI codes by default.
